mapper.sql: id, variable_id AS variableId, element_id AS elementId, button_page_type AS buttonPageType, button_type AS buttonType, button_name AS buttonName, remark, is_del AS isDel, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT btn.id, btn.variable_id AS variableId, btn.element_id AS elementId, btn.button_page_type AS buttonPageType, btn.button_type AS buttonType, btn.button_name AS buttonName, btn.remark, btn.is_del AS isDel, btn.create_user AS createUser, btn.create_time AS createTime, btn.update_user AS updateUser, btn.update_time AS updateTime FROM `t_bpm_variable_button` btn LEFT JOIN `t_bpm_variable` bpm ON btn.`variable_id` = bpm.`id` WHERE bpm.`process_num` = #{processNum} AND btn.element_id = #{elementId}
